title: 08/20/21 DPS Hour 2 Albert Breer
itunes:title: 08/20/21 DPS Hour 2 Albert Breer
description:
Jason Smith and Rob Parker, in for Jason, react to LeBron James taking offense to not receiving a vote in a player poll on who the best player in the league is. The guys compare and contrast LeBron's career to Tom Brady's and debate what defines success in sports. Albert Breer of Monday Morning Quarterback joins the guys to explain why Bill O'Brien may be poised to secede Bill Belichick in a few years, plus the latest details on training camps around the league. Plus, the Yankees have returned to World Series-contender form!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
